stratagems.name: DREAD HOUNDS
stratagems.fluff:
War Dog pilots encircle their terrified
victims then attack in a ferocious mass.
stratagems.when:
The start of your Shooting phase or
the start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.target:
Two or more War Dog units from
your army and one enemy unit that is an
eligible target for each of those selected
War Dog units.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase,
the selected War Dog units can only
target that enemy unit, but all weapons
equipped by those War Dog models gain
the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. In addition,
if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, until
the end of the phase, each time a selected
War Dog model makes an attack against
that enemy unit, an unmodified Hit roll of
5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.name: DISDAIN FOR THE WEAK
stratagems.fluff:
Chaos Knight pilots refuse to yield while
foes remain to be slain, disdainfully
ignoring those who succumb to fear.
stratagems.when:
Fight phase, just after an enemy
unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target:
One Chaos Knights unit from
your army that was selected as the
target of one or more of the attacking
unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, your
model has the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, and
the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against attacks
made by Battle-shocked models.

stratagems.name: PTERRORSHADES
stratagems.fluff:
Shrieking with ghoulish hunger, daemonic
entities descend in a tatterwinged
whirlwind to rend apart the souls of those
enemies who show even a moment’s fear.
The soul-raptors tear apart their victims’
animus and, as they feed, this life force
is channelled to regenerate the battle
damage or heal the pilot of the Knight in
which these creatures roost.
stratagems.when:
Any phase, just after an enemy
unit fails a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.target:
One Chaos Knights unit from
your army that is within 12" of that
enemy unit.
stratagems.effect:
Roll six D6. For each 4+, that
enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound and
this model regains up to 1 lost wound.

stratagems.name: A LONG LEASH
stratagems.fluff:
The War Dogs of the Chaos Knights are
more terrified of their lords than they
are the enemy, and they heed their
masters well, for they know the price of
disobedience or disloyalty.
stratagems.target:
One Abhorrent model from your
army and up to three War Dog models
from your army.
stratagems.effect:
Until the start of your next
Command phase, those War Dog models
count as being within range of any Aura
abilities that Abhorrent model has.

stratagems.name: KNIGHTS OF SHADE
stratagems.fluff:
Like dark phantoms, some Chaos
Knights can move through solid walls
without hindrance.
stratagems.when:
Your Movement phase or your
Charge phase.
stratagems.target:
Up to two War Dog models from
your army or one Titanic Chaos Knights
model from your army.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, the
selected models can move horizontally
through models and terrain features as if
they were not there.

stratagems.name: DIABOLIC BULWARK
stratagems.fluff:
Ectoplasmic blood surges hot through
glowing conduits as the Chaos Knight
feeds power to its shield emitters.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Shooting phase,
just after an enemy unit has selected
its targets.
stratagems.target:
One Chaos Knights unit from
your army that was selected as the
target of one or more of the attacking
unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase,
that Chaos Knights model has a 4+
invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

enhancements.name: Lord of Dread
enhancements.description: Chaos Knights model only. At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of the bearer; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

enhancements.name: Aura of Terror
enhancements.description: Chaos Knights model only. If you control an objective marker at the end of your Command phase, and the bearer is within range of that objective marker, that objective marker is said to be Tainted and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. In addition, while an objective marker is Tainted and under your control and the Despair Dread ability is active for your army, that objective marker has the Despair Dread ability as if it was a Chaos Knights model from your army (so subtract 1 from Battle-shock and Leadership tests taken for enemy units within 12" of it).

enhancements.name: The Traitor's Mark
enhancements.description: Chaos Knights model only. The Doom and Darkness ability is active for the bearer from the first battle round onwards, instead of from the third.

enhancements.name: Panoply of the Cursed Knights
enhancements.description: Chaos Knights model only. Each time an attack is made against the bearer, subtract 1 from the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack.

datasheets.name: Chaos Acastus Knight Asterius
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 Asterius volkite culverins; karacnos mortar battery; 2 twin conversion beam cannons; titanic feet.
wargear: None

other.name: Sunderer of Fortresses
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Vehicle, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 1 (if that attack targets a Fortification, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 2 instead).

damaged.description: While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Chaos Acastus Knight Porphyrion
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 Acastus autocannons; Acastus ironstorm missile pod; 2 twin magna lascannons; titanic feet.
wargear: This model’s 2 Acastus autocannons can each be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 2 lascannons ◦  1 Acastus autocannon and 1 lascannon
This model’s Acastus ironstorm missile pod can be replaced with 1 helios defence missiles.

other.name: Bastion of Firepower
other.description: Each time this model Remains Stationary, until the end of the turn, ranged weapons equipped by this model have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Chaos Cerastus Knight Acheron
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Acheron flame cannon; twin heavy bolter; reaper chainfist.
wargear: None

other.name: Searing Flames
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with an Acheron flame cannon. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

other.name: Unrestrained Terror (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog model is within 6" of this model, it is affected by this ability. At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more War Dog units affected by this ability must take a Battle-shock test.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Chaos Cerastus Knight Atrapos
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Atrapos lascutter; graviton singularity cannon.
wargear: None

other.name: Macro-extinction Protocols
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If that target is Titanic or Towering, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

other.name: Consumed with Hunger (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog model is within 6" of this model, each time that War Dog model makes an attack that targets a Titanic or Towering unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Chaos Cerastus Knight Castigator
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Castigator bolt cannon; tempest warblade.
wargear: None

other.name: Storm of Bolts
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this model is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.name: Offerings for the Dark Gods (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog model is within 6" of this model, ranged weapons equipped by that War Dog model have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Chaos Cerastus Knight Lancer
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Cerastus shock lance.
wargear: None

other.name: Shock Charge
other.description: You can target this model with the Tank Shock Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

other.name: Dark Fervour (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog model is within 6" of this model, ranged weapons equipped by that War Dog model have the [ASSAULT] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: lightning cannon; phased plasma-fusil; reaper chainsword.
wargear: This model’s reaper chainsword can be replaced with 1 hekaton siege claw and 1 twin rad cleanser.

other.name: Huntmaster (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog model is within 6" of this model, each time that War Dog model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or to the Hit roll.

other.name: Repair Auto-simulacra
other.description: At the end of your Command phase, this model regains up to D3 lost wounds.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Chaos Questoris Knight Styrix
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: graviton crusher; volkite chierovile; reaper chainsword.
wargear: This model’s reaper chainsword can be replaced with 1 hekaton siege claw and 1 twin rad cleanser.

other.name: Huntmaster (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog model is within 6" of this model, each time that War Dog model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or to the Hit roll.

other.name: Grav-pinned
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if an enemy Infantry unit was hit by one or more of those attacks made with a graviton crusher, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is grav-pinned. While a unit is grav-pinned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

damaged.range: 1-7 WOUNDS REMAINING                                                                                      characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls
